paper_abstract: Optical bounce phenomenon often occurs in a multi-domain vertical aligned (MVA) mode liquid crystal display (LCD). It results in the double image edge and motion image blur of the LCD. We find that the optical bounce phenomenon is due to nowadays overdriving method. Some suitable change of the method may eliminate the optical bounce phenomenon. (C) 2009 Elsevier B.V. All rights reserved.
paper_title: Optical bounce in a multi-domain vertical aligned liquid crystal display
